/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees dot the sidewalk, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, adding a human element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
